### **Civil Service Rules & Regulations**

Effective January 22, 2003, the Fire Fighters’ and Police Officers’ Civil Service Commission of the City of Robstown adopted Chapter 143 of the Texas Local Government Code. The adoption of Civil Service Rules and Regulations primarily affects members of the Fire Department and Police Department.

### Civil Service Notices

**Commission Meeting:**There are no scheduled meetings at this time.

**Test Notices:**

[NOTICE OF JOB OPPORTUNITY – POLICE – 4TH LATERAL PROGRAM -10-12-2023 to 04-30-2024](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/NOTICE-OF-JOB-OPPORTUNITY-POLICE-4TH-LATERAL-PROGRAM-10-12-2023-to-04-30-2024.pdf)

[NOTICE OF JOB OPPORTUNITY – FIRE – 1st LATERAL PROGRAM – 10-12-2023 TO 04-30-2024](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/A-NOTICE-OF-JOB-OPPORTUNITY-1st-LATERAL-PROGRAM-OCT-12-2023-TO-APRIL-30-2024.pdf)

### More Information

Questions regarding civil service testing or records should be forwarded to the Civil Service Director at 361-387-4589.

**Ph:** 361-387-4589  
**Fax:** 361-387-6760

101 E. Main Street  
Robstown, Texas 78380

**Hours**  
Monday – Friday  
8:00 am – 5:00 pm
